name: DNA and Fingerprint Analysis
description: Methods for extracting and analyzing biological evidence and latent fingerprints.

cards.title: DNA Extraction & Profiling
cards.description: Collecting and analyzing biological samples for forensic investigations.
bulletpoints: Use sterile collection techniques for blood, hair, and bodily fluids
Apply PCR and STR analysis for DNA matching
Interpret CODIS database results to identify suspects
cards.summaryText: Collect pristine samples and run STR profiling to match DNA via CODIS.

cards.title: Latent Fingerprint Analysis & Matching
cards.description: Recovering and analyzing fingerprints from crime scenes.
bulletpoints: Use dusting, cyanoacrylate fuming, and chemical methods for print recovery
Compare fingerprint ridge patterns using AFIS databases
Differentiate between class, loop, arch, and whorl fingerprint types
cards.summaryText: Develop latent prints and compare ridge patterns in AFIS to confirm identities.
